Korea's investment appeal to Middle East Yoon meets Park, honors father in gesture of conservative unity 4-meter deep sinkhole injures 1 in central Seoul [News Focus] A year after Halloween crowd crush, legislation remains stalled Olympic medalist ‘tricked’ by fiance-turned-stalker Start your day with a roundup of key stories from The Korea Herald with news and comment on all that’s happening in Korea. title: K-content industry sets another export record in 2020 at  $11.92 billion
